tool_description: Spot Data by Spotlas powers your app, platform or business with the richest global place of interest data available.
name: Spots
title: Spots

api_list.name: Spot Search
api_list.description:
Search for a Spot in a location of your choice!

# How to Use
> Check out the [Getting Started](https://rapidapi.com/yellow-build-yellow-build-default/api/spots/tutorials/getting-started-with-spots-data) guide for more details.

Use the following JSON schema in the request:
```
 {
    "term": "<search term>",
    "latitude": "<latitude coordinate>",
    "longitude": "<longitude coordinate>"
 }
```
Returns a list of Spots matching the search term around the area specified with longitude and latitude coordinates.

Any Spot ID returned in the response can be used on the Spot Information endpoint to request further information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spots.p.rapidapi.com/v1/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spots.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spots.p.rapidapi.com/v1/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spots.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
